propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.invisible: If true, the backdrop is invisible. It can be used when rendering a popover or a custom select component.
propDescriptions.transitionDuration: The duration for the transition, in milliseconds. You may specify a single timeout for all transitions, or individually with an object.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

invisible.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.
